0001.name: Areca Palm
0001.watering: Let the soil dry out slightly between waterings. Idealy water with rainwater
0001.light: Bright light exposure from a south- or west-facing window

0002.name: Tree Philodendron
0002.watering: Water when the top soil is dry. The tree philodendron does not tolerate drought and grows best with consistent watering.
0002.light: Part shade; avoid direct full sun

9999.name: Jade Tree
9999.watering: No schedule, water when top soil is dry
9999.light: Bright, indirect sunlight. Harsh light can scorch young, immature plants or cause the leaves of older ones to turn red.
